Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Westbound Reroute near State/Cermak
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted  near State/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak  buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, State, Archer, Clark and Cermak including the normal route street  due to police activity near State/Cermak.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
